From the brand

Thanks for Visiting Mevecco

Handmade Jewelry

ABOUT US

“MEVECCO”—Every one of us experiences unforgettable moments.

It is our goal to design jewelry that not only reflects every kind of women but also every lifestyle.

Focus on 18k gold plated jewelry.

How did we get our start?

MEVECCO was born in 2014 in USA with the purpose to create simple day to day feminine jewelry.

What makes our products unique?

Our jewelry not only emphasizes the beauty of every woman but expresses their personality. The different collections are made of high-quality materials so that they can become faithful companions on their owner’s journey through life.

Why do we love what we do?

We aspire to design small treasures for all women to provide a daily dose of luxury.

Cubic Zirconia Tennis Bracelet

Birth Month Flower Necklace

Nail Bangle Cuff Bracelet

Tiny Initial Disc Anklet

Gift Package

Beautifully packaged and ready for giving. Making a genuine sentimental surprise for special person in your life for any occasions.

Item model number ‏ : ‎ BR-02
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 3, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Mevecco
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B095W745HC

Premium Quality: Our dainty pumpkin beads bracelet are all plated twice.We initially plate with 18K gold .After, they are given a lifetime protective finish Immediately after the process of plating.Nickel free, lead free, and hypoallergenic.
What You Get: 1 simple pumpkin beads chain beacelet is packed in delicate gift box.Mevecco design and manufacture.
Made With Love: This unique and heartfelt product is beautifully packaged and ready for giving. Makes a sentimental surprise for any awesome lady. Great gifts for Mom or Grandma on Mother’s Day, anniversary, birthday, or wedding celebration.
✦WELCOME TO “MEVECCO”✦ Modern,Minimal and Easy Going Personalized Jewelry in Affordable Prices ! Handmade and Engraved Personal Pieces,As Well As Delicate Dainty Jewelry and Layered Combos Which Create The Perfect Individual Look ! Feel Free to Send Us Messages with Questions.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $34.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:12:13 UTC – Details)



— OVERVIEW —
– High quality cowhide, 100% handmade (cutting, dyeing, stitching…)
– 10 COLORS, CUSTOM NAME/TEXT/IMAGE… ENGRAVING

— CUSTOMIZATION —
– With an extra charge of US $5/each name/initials/image… in each side, personalized request will be made as your idea.
– We accept request for re-structure products, make as sample or any specials request. Please reach us for more details.

— SHIPPING —
– Order will be completed within 03 to 05 working days after payment has been made. Normal shipping time is approximately 02 to 04 weeks (excluded public holidays) depending on your location.

— GENERAL NOTES —
– Each of our product is uniquely designed and handcrafted. At Unik4art, uniqueness is highly valued.
– Cowhide are widely used in our products. Kindly be aware that marks and random scars are naturally parts of original leather.
– Color of product may vary slightly compared to actual products upon receipt as cowhide is totally dyed by hand. We have 10 colors for you as final photo.
– The engraving text/image is always black, so that the darker the color, the less outstanding it is.
– If you don’t note us about the details position, the name/text will be engraved with the font Arial, on the right corner.

Should you have further questions, additional requests for your orders, please do not hesitate to reach us by leaving a comment at “Note to Seller”. We will quickly response you within 12 hours.

Enjoy Shopping!

About Plumiss

natural stone crystal jewelry

Mainly focus on researching, developing, producing all kind HANDMADE, NATURAL STONE, CRYSTAl JEWELRY, such as handmade bracelet, necklace earrings and so on.

We try our best to select the most good original materials and improving our handmade quality, just want to give you the best shopping experience. We hope our products can bring you a better life, let you become more beautiful, confident and different.

We receive custom design, just mail us what you need, we will try all our best to solve your problems. also welcome you to give us any suggestions about our products or service!

Thanks for your love to our products and support!

Read more

Agalmatolite Bracelet

There has many different designs leather wrap bracelets, and they are certainly a popular fashion accessory for daily life. Both men and women enjoy wearing this accessory since it can be customized into either very feminine or masculine style. Most of the bracelets can be designed either single, double, triple or 5 layers wrap which wrapped around on your wrist. For persons that wish to have a more outgoing look, mix and match with different wraps and designs is definitely a fantastic choice. Inspired from natural beauty and vitality, hope this accessories can bring more energy and increase your love for life.

Model Show

This bracelet is made with genuine gemstones. Variations and inclusions in natural stones are expected and only enhance their beauty. You will receive one of the exact bracelets shown in the pictures.

The most special and charming of natural stone jewelry is they are different of each piece, with the unique texture, like all of us are the unique one in the world.

Gemstone Energy

At Energy Muse, our gemstones and crystals have healing properties that help to balance the body, mind, and spirit. Healing crystals and gemstones have been used for thousands of years by ancient civilizations; the Egyptians, Aztecs, and others incorporated healing stones into jewelry, cosmetics, decorative statues, amulets, and much more–a testament to the powerful ability of gemstones to release mental, physical, and spiritual blockages.

How to Wear Plumiss Wrap Bracelet

you can loose the knot on the end , then retie it depend on your wrist size, then cut the extra part. If the one you bought is vegan rope design, finish it off by burning the end of the thread to prevent fraying
